title: The Breaking Point|EPUB|
description:
DETAILS 
author: Mary Roberts Rinehart
published: 1922
language: English
word count: 113,607 / 318 pg

genre: Thriller

OVERVIEW 


Elizabeth Wheeler lives in a small town, sings in the church choir, and dreams of a man who will sweep her off her feet. Instead, she is thrust into a series of events beyond her control leading to passion, madness, betrayal, and ultimately, murder! Can she ever set thing right?


ABOUT THE AUTHOR 

Mary Roberts Rinehart was an American writer, often called the American Agatha Christie, although her first mystery novel was published 14 years before Christie's first novel in 1922.
